sentences.en: But, within a certain range, neither nature nor parallel computers are troubled by convoluted logic.
sentences.cn: 不过, 在一定范围内, 无论是大自然,还是并行计算机都不会受到错综复杂的逻辑的困扰.

sentences.en: Despite its length and convoluted plot, "Asta's Book" is a rich and rewarding read.
sentences.cn: 虽然篇幅很长，而且情节复杂，但是《阿斯塔的书》仍不失为一部内容丰富、值得一读的作品。

sentences.en: He is able to explain convoluted theory in words of syllable.
sentences.cn: 他能用及其简单的言语解释复杂的理论.

sentences.en: His argument was so convoluted that few of us could follow a it intelligently.
sentences.cn: 他的论点是如此费解,很少有我们可以按照它聪明.

sentences.en: However, when the problem grows more convoluted, the incremental, multiple - step Undo model doesn't scale very well.
sentences.cn: 然而当程序变得更复杂时, 渐增的多次撤销模型却不能很好地随之扩展.
冗长的段落和费解的句子

sentences.en: Nephron included renal corpuscle, proximal convoluted tubule ( PCT ), medullary loop , distal convoluted tubule ( DCI ), and connected tubule.
sentences.cn: 肾单位包括肾小球 、 近曲小管 、 髓袢 、 远曲小臂和连接小管5部分.

sentences.en: Phe also abated pathological changes of hepatic chondriosomes hepatocyte, hepatic lobules, alveoli, segmental bronchi convoluted tubules.
sentences.cn: 对内毒素大鼠肝线粒体以及肝细胞 、 肝小叶结构 、 肺泡 、 肺间质、肺支气管、肾曲管细胞等损害具保护作用.

sentences.en: Such convoluted steps belie the underlying strength of what is being sold.
sentences.cn: 这些复杂的措施辱没了将被出售公司的内在实力.
这一论点令人颇为费解。

sentences.en: The glomeruli and proximal convoluted tubules suffer most from this ischemia.
sentences.cn: 肾小球及近曲小管受缺血损害最重.

sentences.en: The snake slithered through a convoluted path.
The software is as multifaceted as a diamond and as convoluted as a primeval jungle.
sentences.cn: 这里的软件既像钻石一样能多面反射光芒,又像原始丛林一样复杂难测.

sentences.en: Their relationship is somewhat ambiguous, it is convoluted like hemp vines.
sentences.cn: 他们的关系犹如葛藤,暧昧不清.

sentences.en: This seemingly convoluted lifecycle begins to make sense only in an environment in which change dominates.
sentences.cn: 这个看起来混乱不堪的生命周期仅仅在经常变化的环境下才有意义.

sentences.en: You've planning something in that convoluted pixie mind of yours.
sentences.cn: 你那颗爱恶作剧的复杂脑瓜子,是在盘算着什么花招吧.

sentences.en: Your mind becomes frozen, as it gets caught up in a web of convoluted negative thoughts.
sentences.cn: 你变得心灰意冷, 因为它让你陷入错综复杂的消极的思维网络中,难以自拔.

trans.tran_cn: 回旋，卷绕，盘旋( convolute的过去式和过去分词 )
